resources.string: Hello, this is an application created by students of the Peter the Great St. Petersburg Polytechnic University on the course of the OPD. It is aimed at improving the environmental situation on the territory of SPbPU and in the future, with the development of the project, on the territory of other universities. \n The project contains: a separate waste collection map, a carbon footprint calculator and a news portal for those who like to participate in the ecological life of the Polytechnic University and not only.

Hello! 
		This is an application created by students of Peter the Great St. Petersburg Polytechnic University in the course of OPD. 

		The project aims to address the environmental crisis by providing students of Peter the Great St. Petersburg Polytechnic University with the tools to reduce their carbon footprint and waste. The project is subject for development, since all ambitious plans require only time. It is possible to support the project or transfer it to ReGreen.

We do not store the information you enter, other than the total calculated carbon footprint
